name: Wizards Roll
description:
The game was created in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022

Welcome to an ancient wizard tournament!

Compete against four wizard opponents in this trial of luck and magic.

In this tournament all spells are cast by assembling dice combinations following poker-dice (yahtzee) rules.

All wizards have an arsenal of 8 spells - offensive, defensive and with varying target rules.

You have 3 rolls per round to assemble the most powerful (or useful at the moment) spell.

Rounds go until only the one most wise and lucky is left standing.

Put your wits in the roll of the dice!
